    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player​(int n, java.lang.String name)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeAthenaCondition​(boolean active)
    sets the athena condition of the player
    void changePanCondition​(boolean active)
    sets the pan condition of the player
    private void deleteWorkers()
    this method is used in a three players game if one has lost this method deletes the references of the workers of the player that has lost
    GodsList getGod()  
    boolean getHasLost()  
    boolean getHasWon()  
    Box getLastBuildBox()
    Getter for lastBuildBox, lastBuildBox is used by Demeter to prevent the player from building two times on the same cell

    Getter for lastMoveBox, lastMoveBox is used by Artemis to prevent the player from moving back to his old position

    • getLastMoveBox

      public Box getLastMoveBox()
      Getter for lastMoveBox, lastMoveBox is used by Artemis to prevent the player from moving back to his old position

    • setLastMoveBox

      public void setLastMoveBox​(Box lastMoveBox)
      Setter for lastMoveBox, lastMoveBox is used by Artemis to prevent the player from moving back to his old position

      public Box getLastBuildBox()
